Class SearchServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.search.impl.SearchServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchService
@Singleton public class SearchServiceImpl extends Object implements SearchService
A federated search service implementation. see SearchService

  • Constructor Details

    • SearchServiceImpl

      @Inject public SearchServiceImpl(JSwordSearchService jswordSearch, JSwordMetadataService jswordMetadata, JSwordVersificationService versificationService, SubjectSearchService subjects, TimelineService timeline, BibleInformationService bibleInfoService, EntityManager entityManager, VersionResolver versionResolver, LexiconDefinitionService lexiconDefinitionService, JSwordRelatedVersesService relatedVerseService, StrongAugmentationService strongAugmentationService)
      Parameters:
      jswordSearch - the search service
      subjects - the service that executes Subject searches
      timeline - the timeline service
      bibleInfoService - the service to get information about various bibles/commentaries
      entityManager - the manager for all entities stored in lucene
      relatedVerseService - the related verse service
      strongAugmentationService - the service to deal with augmentation of strong numbers

      Estimates the number of results returned by the search

    • runQuery

      public AbstractComplexSearch runQuery(List<SearchToken> searchTokens, String options, String display, int page, String filter, String sort, int context, String originalItems, String userLanguage)
      Description copied from interface: SearchService
      Runs the appropriate search for the given list of search tokens
      Specified by:
      runQuery in interface SearchService
      Parameters:
      searchTokens - the tokens
      options - the options ticked by the user
      display - the type of display mode, e.g. interlinear, interleaved, etc.
      page - the page number to retrieve
      filter - the filter to apply (or blank to retrieve just the particular search query.
      sort - the type of sort
      context - the number of extra verses to lookup for each verse
      originalItems - the original query as given by the user
      userLanguage - the user language in the browser (e.g.: en, zh, es, ...)
      Returns:
      the results from the search/passage lookup
